articles.title: Coronavirus causes blood clots and sudden strokes in young, healthy patients, doctors warn - The Sun
articles.content:
CORONAVIRUS can cause blood clots and sudden strokes in young, healthy patients, doctors have warned.
Medics in New York say they have seen a sevenfold increase in stroke cases in people in their 30s and 40s who either had mild or no Covid-19 symptoms at all… [+5568 chars]

articles.content:
From a fever to a dry cough, coronavirus is known to be associated with a range of unpleasant side effects.

articles.description: Three new cases of Covid-19 have been confirmed in the NHS Highland area, taking the overall total to 214.
articles.content:
Coronavirus news.
